Package it.polimi.se2018.model.score

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PublicObjectiveScore
    Interface Public Objective Score Interface Used to call the needed function in relation of which PublicObjectiveCard were set at the beginning of the match.
    ScoreTrack
    ScoreTrack Interface This interface is implemented by CalcScore class is used to calculate the players score
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalcScore
    Score Calculator Class ScoreTrack This class is used to compute the total score of a player
    ColoredDiagonals
    ColoredDiagonals Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by adjacent Die of the same color on the same diagonal
    DeepShades
    Light Shades Points Counter Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class return the points earned by the number of 5 and 6 sets (couple everywhere in the player's Die grid)
    DifferentColorColumn
    DifferentColorColumn implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by column with no color repetitions
    DifferentColorRow
    DifferentColorRow Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by rows with no color repetitions
    DifferentColors
    Different Shades Set Counter implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by set of Die of different colors
    DifferentShadeColumn
    DifferentShadeColumn Class This class is used to compute the public score earned by column with no Die value repetitions
    DifferentShades
    Different Shades Set Counter implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by set of Die with different values
    DifferentShadesRow
    DifferentShadeRow Class This class is used to compute the public score earned by row with no Die value repetitions
    LightShades
    Light Shades Points Counter Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class return the points earned by the number of 1 and 2 sets (couple everywhere in the player's Die grid)
    MediumShades
    Light Shades Points Counter Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class return the points earned by the number of 3 and 4 sets (couple everywhere in the player's Die grid)
    ScoreFactory
    ScoreFactory Class This class is a factory method based on the number of the card.
    TestCalcScore
    TestCalcScore Class Player score computer tester class
    TestColoredDiagonals
    TestColoredDiagonals Class Test the efficiency of TestColoredDiagonals points counter
    TestDeepShades
    DeepShades Set Tester Test the efficiency of DeepShades points counter
    TestDifferentColorColumn
    TestDifferentColorColumn Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentColorColumn points counter
    TestDifferentColorRow
    TestDifferentColorRow Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentColorRow points counter
    TestDifferentColors
    TestDifferentColors Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentColors points counter
    TestDifferentShadeColumn
    TestDifferentShadeColumn Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentShadeColumn points counter
    TestDifferentShadeRow
    TestDifferentShadeRow Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentShadeRow points counter
    TestDifferentShades
    Test class of DifferentShades Test the efficiency of DifferentShades points counter
    TestLightShades
    LightShades Set Tester Test the efficiency of LightShades points counter
    TestMediumShades
    MediumShades Set Tester Test the efficiency of MediumShades points counter
